resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all the notification history data ?

Due to a bug in Samsungs\'s Software, you can experience the phone to read aloud some of your actions.\n \n To prevent this, you will need to disable Samsung TTS and Google TTS. This will not affect any app using TTS features.
NotificationsHistory service is not running currently. This service should be running in order for this app to give correct results.
Notification tracker records all the incoming notifications.\n\nIt can be used to analyze which app is spamming your mobile with unwanted notifications.

Ignore app will remove the notifications from specific app in this app.

Unwanted apps can be uninstalled by long click on that app.

Delete Icon removes the notification of specific app.

Click on any app to see the detailed notifications.
Select the ignored apps to remove them from the ignored list.
Turn on the accessibility service in order to allow Notification Tracker to record all the 3rd party apps.
